description:
Dot loves watching the colorful fireflies over the lagoon. 
Help Dot match their colors as they fly up, down, and all around!

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn on yellow lights when tilted to lean left. Then make Dot automatically return to Start.

hints.description: Drag out a Yellow light. Link Start to the light using a Lean Left cue. Link the light back to Start using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn on magenta lights when tilted to lean right. Then make Dot automatically return to Start.

hints.description: Drag out a Magenta light. Link Start to the light using a Lean Right cue. Link the light back to Start using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn on green lights when tilted face down. Then make Dot automatically return to Start.

hints.description: Drag out a Green light. Link Start to the light using a Face Down cue. Link the light back to Start using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn on cyan lights when tilted face up. Then make Dot automatically return to Start.

hints.description: Drag out a Cyan light. Link Start to the light using a Face Up cue. Link the light back to Start using an Auto cue.
